| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |

| 10 | 7, 9 | #P_eqssd | |- ( ( T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ U C_ T ) -> ( T .(+) U ) = T ) |
